name: Fallen Winter (Beta Testing!)
description:
Fallen Winter is a Single Player horror game about being stuck in a cave and having to escape, and fighting off the horrors that face you

This was a project made by a small south korean indie dev team!

We do need testers so please email us if you're willing to test (Email coming soon!)

This project was started mid 2022 and is finally close to completion nearly.. Mid 2023... But it hasn't stopped us yet! We're at the top of our game pushing out as many as we can! So please leave a rating if you enjoy our games and give us some feedback of what we can do better

Donations are turned off because we're doing just fine right now and we're in it to make people happy instead of getting paid!
